channel.title: Workspace Gateway on
channel.description: Recent content in Workspace Gateway on

item.title: Enable Workspace Gateway
item.description:
This section introduces how to enable workspace gateways.

Prerequisites

  • KubeSphere Gateway should have been installed and enabled.

  • You should join a workspace and have the Workspace Gateway Management permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Gateway Management permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Workspace Settings > Gateway Settings in the left navigation pane.

  3. On the right side of the Gateway Settings page, click Enable Gateway.

    Note

    Enabling project gateways on the workspace’s Gateway Settings page is not supported. If you need to enable a project gateway, please go to the corresponding project.

item.title: View Workspace Gateway Information
item.description:
This section introduces how to view workspace gateway information.

Note

If the cluster gateway has been enabled, you can also view the cluster gateway information on the workspace’s gateway settings page.

Prerequisites

  • KubeSphere Gateway should have been installed and enabled.

  • You should join a workspace and have the Workspace Gateway Viewing permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

item.title: View Workspace Gateway Details
item.description:
This section introduces how to view workspace gateway details.

Prerequisites

  • KubeSphere Gateway should have been installed and enabled.

  • You should join a workspace and have the Workspace Gateway Viewing permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Gateway Viewing permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Workspace Settings > Gateway Settings in the left navigation pane.

  3. On the right side of the page, select Manage > View Details to open the gateway details page.

  4. On the gateway details page, view the resource attributes of the gateway in the Attributes area on the left.

    Parameter Description

    Cluster

item.title: Edit Workspace Gateway Settings
item.description:
This section introduces how to edit workspace gateway settings.

Prerequisites

  • KubeSphere Gateway should have been installed and enabled.

  • You should join a workspace and have the Workspace Gateway Management permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Gateway Management permission, and access your workspace.

  2. Click Workspace Settings > Gateway Settings in the left navigation pane.

  3. On the right side of the page, select Manage > Edit.

  4. In the pop-up dialog box, modify the parameters of the gateway, and then click OK.

    Parameter Description

    IngressClassName

item.title: Disable Workspace Gateway
item.description:
This section introduces how to disable workspace gateways.

Warning

After disabling the gateway, clients will not be able to access the services reverse-proxied by the gateway, and related business may be interrupted. Please proceed with caution.

Prerequisites

  • KubeSphere Gateway should have been installed and enabled.

  • You should join a workspace and have the Workspace Gateway Management permission within the workspace. For more information, refer to "Workspace Members" and "Workspace Roles".
